title: Ingrid, the Ashen Witch
body:
Ingrid is a top/mid laner based around declaring and expanding her territory, with counterplay built in around her white ashes. Throughout the laning phase, the enemy laner will be forced to decide whether or not it's worth walking into her White Ashes to deny her the buff at that location. Which culminates in her ult, when the enemy realises just how far they have trespassed into her ashes.

-------

When she was young, Ingrid was a prodigy at fire magic, and she was fascinated by the dancing flames. One day, when she was practicing a particularly high level spell, she was so entranced that she lost control, burning her home and family to ash. Stricken with grief; suffering from terrible burns; and scared that she would be executed for the murder of her family, she fled.

In the years after the incident, she secluded herself in a small grove. As she grew older, she discovered something of an affinity for ashes, eventually incorporating it into her fire magic. 

Unfortunately, she was forced out of her home when the Demacian army marched through her forest in order to outflank the Noxian forces, the conflict left the area devastated.

Now, she seeks to make a new home amidst the ashes of Demacia.

------

**Passive: Ashes of the past**
_Standing here almost reminds me of home_
When standing on **Scattered ash** gains 20% cooldown reduction (applied independently of regular cdr), +5-15% damage reduction, and +5-10% movement speed.

**Q: Burning ashes**
_The ashes burn hotter the the flames_
Throws white hot ashes in target direction, if they hit an enemy deals 50-200 (+0.3 AP) damage on impact and 30-180 (+0.2 AP) over the next 3 seconds. If the ashes miss, they mark the ground underneath the endpoint as **White ash**.
If an enemy walks over **White ash** they are dealt 20-150 (+0.2 AP) damage over the next 3 seconds. If no one walks over **White ash** for 5 seconds, the ground becomes **Scattered ash** for the next 2 minutes.

**W: Ashen shield**
Ingrid creates a shield of ash around her that blocks 60-200 (+0.6 AP) damage for the next 1-2 seconds. When the shield wears off, turns a small area around her into **Scattered ash** for the next 1 minute, area changed is doubled if the shield is destroyed before it wears off.

**E: Immolate**
_Life is but a moment away from ash._
Ingrid attempts to incinerate target enemy, dealing 40-150 (+0.3 AP) damage. If **Immolate** kills the target enemy, turns the ground around them into **White ash**. Deals double damage to minions.

**R: Memories of the Inferno**
_Even ash remembers what it was like to burn_
Ingrid channels for 1 second ignites all the **Scattered ash** within a large area around her, dealing 30-60 (+0.2-0.4 AP) damage per second to all enemies standing on **Scattered ash**, after 5 seconds the ignited ash explodes dealing 100-200 (+0.3-0.7 AP) damage to all enemies standing on **Scattered ash** within range.
All ignited ash is consumed.

**Taunts:**

To enemy Brand
_You seem to be burning. I can fix that for you._

To enemy Freljordian
_I fear not what the ice brings._

To enemy Annie
_It's like looking at a younger, stupider me._

To enemy Leona
_The sun burns all to ash. I burn the ashes._

To enemy Shyvana
_Dragonfire huh? I thought I felt a cool breeze._

To enemy Maokai
_You'll make some lovely ash._

To enemy Sejuani of Lissandra
_You should surrender now. You were already having trouble with ash before I showed up_

To enemy Ashe
_Who would trust the ashes to protect the ice?_

_I'll help you to look more like your namesake._

**Quotes**

On walking
_I'm hobbling as fast as I can._

On buying Hextech items
_Would call this a gizmo, or a doohickey?_

On buying Rabadons Deathcap
_Now THIS is a hat._

On buying Liandry's Torment
_Will this make more children scream at the sight of me, or less?_

On killing with her ultimate
_Scatter with the ashes!_

**Joke**
_Trespassers will be burnt. Survivors will be incinerated._
